about:
I love meeting new people, travelling, and hosting!  And as an airbnb host for the past 4 years - properties and holiday rentals have become somewhat of my hobby! 

I speak 4 languages fluently: English, French, Portuguese and Spanish. And can communicate at a beginner level in Italian and Dutch.  So please feel free to contact me in which ever language easiest for you.

recommendation.recommendation: Mitzy is one of the kindest people I know. With her amazing people skills, and a keen eye for detail, she makes an amazing AirBNB host. She is warm, friendly, and inviting, and takes true pleasure in making sure that her guests are comfortable. I have stayed at her place several times, and left feeling very relaxed. Not only is her apartment amazingly located in one of the best areas in Amsterdam, but it has a canal view, and is one of the cleanest rooms I have ever slept in. I would highly recommend trusting Mitzy with your next stay!

school: Dawson College, Concordia University, McGill University
